snippet.title: This Is Anthem | Gameplay Series, Part 1: Story, Progression, and Customization
snippet.description:
Go in-depth on Anthem and get detailed information about the javelins, customization, and progression. Plus, learn more about the Freelancers and your purpose in the world of Anthem. 

Subscribe and be the first to see Anthem trailers and gameplay videos: http://bit.ly/2qZN5QV. 

Discover more: http://x.ea.com/32090.
